metadata.title: Evaluate to true if the win-def:lockoutpolicy_test is properly supported.
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the win-def:lockoutpolicy_test.

notes.note: It is important to note that the values used in this test definition are specific to a particular machine, and may not necessarily apply to your system. As a result, in order to have the definition return a result of 'true', you must either change these values to the ones found on your particular system, or you must configure your system to use these values.

criterion.comment: Test if the lockoupolicy_test is supported.

lockoutpolicy_test.comment: Test if the lockoupolicy_test is supported.

lockoutpolicy_state.comment: This state represents a lockoutpolicy_object that has a force logoff time greater than or equal to -1, a lockout duration greater than or equal to 0, a lockout observation window greater than or equal to 0, and a lockout threshold greater than or equal to 0.
